settings.weeklyReportDesc: Receive a weekly summary of your progress

settings.changePasswordDesc: Update your password regularly for security
settings.twoFactorAuthDesc: Add an extra layer of security to your account
settings.deleteAccountDesc: Permanently delete your account and all associated data
settings.deleteAccountConfirmMsg: Are you sure you want to delete your account? All data (sessions, notes, settings) will be permanently deleted and cannot be recovered.
